1_1FHZZ13tmi64crAx9n8qJQkkEkCcKguaei.body: If it's your site, can you get Trisquel on the site. I know it isn't a major release however it is the most popular GNU certified OS and I think it should be represented.

Another suggestion. Could you organize them by popularity? Though not perfect, the 12 month DistroRanking score would be a good way to judge popularity. It just means when people are looking for distibutions on ZeroLinux (which by the way I love) they are most likely to come across the one they want at the top.

https://distrowatch.com/dwres.php?resource=popularity
